thread.title: BRIEF-Chuy's Holdings Inc Sees FY 2018 Earnings Per Share Of $1.12 To $1.16

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chuy's Holdings Inc Sees FY 2018 Earnings Per Share Of $1.12 To $1.16
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Chuy’s Holdings Inc:
* CHUY’S HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE $96 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $95.6 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.20 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES ‍ FISCAL YEAR 2018 COMPARABLE RESTAURANT SALES GROWTH OF 1.0% TO 1.5%​
* SEES ‍ FISCAL YEAR 2018 NET CAPITAL EXPENDITURES (NET OF TENANT IMPROVEMENT ALLOWANCES) OF $30.0 MILLION TO $40.0 MILLION​
* QTRLY ‍COMPARABLE RESTAURANT SALES INCREASED 1.3% AS COMPARED TO SAME PERIOD IN 2016​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
